title: Bloomberg Law: North Korean Threat on the Rise (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law: North Korean Threat on the Rise (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Jens David Ohlin, Professor at Cornell University Law School and Kevin Jon Heller, Professor at the University of London, discuss the augmented threat that is coming out of North Korea and what it means on a geopolitical level. They speak with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
